/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by brick buildings on both sides, their red-brown hues adding a touch of warmth to the scene. Bare trees, devoid of leaves, line the street, their branches reaching out towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a soft, natural light. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye down the length of the street. The overall effect is a harmonious blend of urban architecture and natural elements, a characteristic feature of Beijing's cityscape.
